name: Convergent
description:
Enter your rhythm zen, heighten your focus, and weave your ship in Convergent!

Overview

Convergent is a short and sweet rhythm-based game about a ship dodging and deflecting incoming bullets! Switch lanes with a simple left and right and deflect incoming red bullets with space bar. Each song has 4 possible difficulties, with a special theme around every song.

Original Soundtracks!

Bask your auditory sensors with 4 of our originally composed music, ranging from EDM to classical music. Music include:
* Hyperspeed
* Spectrum
* 7000 Lies
* Happy Go Round
